actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The knight makes two attacks, using Greatsword or Heavy Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +2, range 100/400 ft. Hit: 11 (2d10) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Radiant damage.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.trigger: The knight is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.
reactions.response: The knight adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.
